MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the WA10 postcode area of St.Helens, affecting properties in Hall Street and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 10.52AM. We are aware of the previous power cuts affecting your area and we apologise for this. Our engineers are on their way to the area to investigate the power loss. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible. We expect the power to be restored by 2PM. Once they arrive, or when we receive any update regarding the cause, we will update this message. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 11.17AM on 20th December 2020.
